titleStmt.title: An ansvvere to a letter of a Iesuited gentleman, by his cosin, Maister A.C. Concerning the appeale; state, Iesuits
titleStmt.author: Copley, Anthony, 1567-1607?
Champney, Anthony, 1569?-1643?, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Concerning the appeal against the Archpriest George Blackwell.
The words "appeale; state, Iesuits." are bracketed together on the title page.
Quires E-P have vertical chain lines.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
